snippet: Frank Darabont claims in his suit that he has been cheated out of millions of dollars by the network that is the producing studio for the show, the most successful ever on cable.
abstract: Frank Darabont, creator of one of television's biggest hit shows, The Walking Dead, escalates his long feud with AMC network, charging in lawsuit that he has been cheated out of tens of millions of dollars because of 'self-dealing' by network.
lead_paragraph: Frank Darabont claims in his suit that he has been cheated out of millions of dollars by the network that is the producing studio for the show, the most successful ever on cable.

headline.main: ‘The Walking Dead’ Creator Is Suing AMC Over Payouts
headline.print_headline: ‘The Walking Dead’ Creator Is Suing AMC Over Payouts
